description: I see the fires spreading through her mind, down to her eyes. I'm afraid the sparks of joy might one day turn into fires of rage. What if she does not see the truth one day, over the fire in her eyes... The fire animations actually are real fires I built and shot. This is the second piece in the series ''The Fire In Her'' Fist piece can be seen here: objkt.link/50189 Visit: blendreams.com/thefireinhermind for the full experience. instagram.com/blendreams twitter.com/blendreams Music: Out of Flux - Chaos at the Spaceship
